parameters.name: DBInstanceId
parameters.description:
The instance ID.

> You can call the [DescribeDBInstances](~~86911~~) operation to query the information about all AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instances within a region, including instance IDs.

parameters.name: InstanceNetworkType
parameters.description:
The new network type of the instance. Valid values:

*   VPC
*   Classic

parameters.name: PrivateIpAddress
parameters.description: The internal IP address of the instance.

parameters.name: VPCId
parameters.description: The virtual private cloud (VPC) ID of the instance.

parameters.name: VSwitchId
parameters.description: The vSwitch ID of the instance. This parameter must be specified when VPCId is specified.
